name: Matrix Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Matrix Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Matrix API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Matrix API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: message

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: getAll
available_options: Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many members

roomId.name: roomId
roomId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
roomId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Room Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

eventId.name: eventId
eventId.description: The room related to the event
eventId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Event ID | 作用: The room related to the event | (必填项)

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Input Binary Field | 提示: The name of the input binary field containing the file to be uploaded | 默认值: data | (必填项)

mediaType.name: mediaType
mediaType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Media Type | 作用: Type of file being uploaded | 默认值: image | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: fileName (值: None) - Name of the file being uploaded

text.name: text
text.natural_language_description: 参数名: Text | 作用: The text to send

messageType.name: messageType
messageType.description: The type of message to send
messageType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Message Type | 作用: The type of message to send | 默认值: m.text
available_options: Emote (值: m.emote) - Perform an action (similar to /me in IRC)
Text (值: m.text) - Send a text message

messageFormat.name: messageFormat
messageFormat.description: The format of the message's body
messageFormat.natural_language_description: 参数名: Message Format | 作用: The format of the message's body | 默认值: plain

fallbackText.name: fallbackText
fallbackText.description: A plain text message to display in case the HTML cannot be rendered by the Matrix client
fallbackText.natural_language_description: 参数名: Fallback Text | 作用: A plain text message to display in case the HTML cannot be rendered by the Matrix client

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False | (必填项)

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

otherOptions.name: otherOptions
otherOptions.natural_language_description: 参数名: Other Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: filter (值: None) - A JSON RoomEventFilter to filter returned events with. More information can be found on this page.

roomName.name: roomName
roomName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Room Name | (必填项)

preset.name: preset
preset.natural_language_description: 参数名: Preset | 默认值: public_chat | (必填项)
available_options: Public Chat (值: public_chat) - Open and public chat

roomIdOrAlias.name: roomIdOrAlias
roomIdOrAlias.natural_language_description: 参数名: Room ID or Alias | (必填项)

userId.name: userId
userId.natural_language_description: 参数名: User ID | 作用: The fully qualified user ID | (必填项)

reason.name: reason
reason.natural_language_description: 参数名: Reason | 作用: Reason for kick

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 作用: Filtering options | 默认值: {}
available_options: notMembership (值: None) - Excludes members whose membership is other than selected (uses OR filter with membership)
membership (值: None) - Only fetch users with selected membership status (uses OR filter with exclude membership)
